1112082283308220417.text: This is unquestionably the most irresponsible & ignorant statement made by a sitting president.  Our great country deserves better than you. https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/449525268529815552 …

1112241555249729537.text: wow you really went out of your way to find that one didn’t ya?

1112128625803972609.text: I agree but this tweet is also from 2014 so his opinion may have changed

1112337947997753344.text: Not at all ... the undereducated (including anti-vaccinators) that Trump preys upon are passing this message as if it has scientific validity. Since 2003 there have been nine CDC studies showing no link between vaccines and autism; yet Trumps spreads his ignorance.

1112462125769859074.text: i don’t see this tweet being... passed around. you’re focusing on something he said 5 years ago. a lot has happened in those 5 years. he could have been educated on this topic since then. so what’s your point in pulling something from 2014?

1112467643502653440.text: I’ve seen it multiple times recently. Trump never recanted his misinformation on vaccines as related to autism. Trump spreads fear of vaccinations for reasons he never explains and refuses to defend. The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance but the illusion of knowledge.
